channel.title: A bunch of problems, errors
channel.description:
Hey guys. I've been hiding in the shadows a bit just looking for topics that have to do with this. Reading readme's, reading server stuff, ect but haven't found what I'm looking for and asking a question on. First of all I have Vista. I don't know if that interferes with anything... Now I downloaded the latest version of MoparScape yesterday. Got that played a bit on it but it rly isn't that fun without servers. So I downloaded a couple player made servers to test them out.
So I have them all downloaded now. I opened up one folder and clicked 'runserver' because as of now I believe that is what you are supposed to do. I got the console and in it said that the server was online like its supposed to be. I open up MoparScape click 'enter' type in a username and password. I clicked login and logged in. SOOO, this is where things get dumb (this is just one of my errors). I login and my character doesn't show up. I'm invisible. I walk around and trade with a vendor. Some of their shops open others cause the server to disconnect so I reopen everything again. I click on my equipment and the server disconnects me again. Here is the message I get (this happened for various servers not just FigmentScape):
- FigmentScape - .. Online! Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49503. Client type: low memory version UserId: 62467803 thor is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-thor]: Loading finished. Game saved for player thor ClientHandler: Client thor disconnected.
This happens all the time! I can't do anything at all. Can someone please help me with this problem? ;)
The other problem I'm having is with Butter's Dream actually. I start up the client and click 'enter' fill in my username and password and then click login. It says connecting to server for a moment then goes back to the menu that says simply 'enter'. it doesn't matter how many times I try logging in it always does this. Could someone please help me? ;)

item.title: A bunch of problems, errors
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You’ll need to use this webclient;
www.client.silabsoft.org
That’s what most shitty player made servers consist of.

Read full topic

@sanjay1994 wrote:

i need the cache

Read full topic

item.title: A bunch of problems, errors
item.dc:creator: @Marcus_Rethan Marcus Rethan
item.description:
@Marcus_Rethan wrote:

Hey guys. I’ve been hiding in the shadows a bit just looking for topics that have to do with this. Reading readme’s, reading server stuff, ect but haven’t found what I’m looking for and asking a question on. First of all I have Vista. I don’t know if that interferes with anything… Now I downloaded the latest version of MoparScape yesterday. Got that played a bit on it but it rly isn’t that fun without servers. So I downloaded a couple player made servers to test them out.

So I have them all downloaded now. I opened up one folder and clicked ‘runserver’ because as of now I believe that is what you are supposed to do. I got the console and in it said that the server was online like its supposed to be. I open up MoparScape click ‘enter’ type in a username and password. I clicked login and logged in. SOOO, this is where things get dumb (this is just one of my errors). I login and my character doesn’t show up. I’m invisible. I walk around and trade with a vendor. Some of their shops open others cause the server to disconnect so I reopen everything again. I click on my equipment and the server disconnects me again. Here is the message I get (this happened for various servers not just FigmentScape):

  • FigmentScape -
    … Online!
    Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49503.
    Client type: low memory version
    UserId: 62467803
    thor is signing onto server.
    LOADED: 3
    [client-1-thor]: Loading finished.
    Game saved for player thor
    ClientHandler: Client thor disconnected.

This happens all the time! I can’t do anything at all. Can someone please help me with this problem?

The other problem I’m having is with Butter’s Dream actually. I start up the client and click ‘enter’ fill in my username and password and then click login. It says connecting to server for a moment then goes back to the menu that says simply ‘enter’. it doesn’t matter how many times I try logging in it always does this. Could someone please help me?

Read full topic
